name: Chüze - Chat & story game
description:
The new choice-driven dating simulator where every match has its unique story!

Chüze is a safe space for you to dive into relationships with one-of-a-kind characters from various backgrounds. Your special someone is waiting to meet you there — swipe right and see for yourself!

Chüze is not your ordinary relationship simulator; it is a thrilling immersive experience with AI-generated photos and videos. Enjoy the diversity of unique characters and get lost in breath-taking romance.

- Explore your fantasies and swipe through hundreds of profiles to find your perfect match.
- With Chüze, you can be picky! Talk to as many matches as you want while they fight to become your only one or focus your attention on the one relationship you want to turn into something special.
- Collect the spicy selfies your matches send you, save them to your gallery, and enjoy them any time.
- Make choices that affect your relationships, react to what your matches say, express and explore yourself. Let your matches get to know you so that they can romance you the way you deserve!

Don't wait another minute. Start swiping with Chüze now!
